#inf1#: ###THIS IS THE CONFIG FILE FOR THE DISLOGGER APPLICATION. IT IS A SAMPLE FILE ###
#inf2#: ### THAT YOU CAN MODIFY. TO KNOW WHAT TO CHANGE, JUST LOOK AT OTHER '#info#'  ###
#inf3#: ###            KEYS AND MAKE YOUR APPLICATION BEHAVE AS YOU WISH.             ###

formatters.#inf1#: ### THIS IS WHERE YOU SPECIFY THE FORMATTING INSTANCES FOR THE HANDLERS.  ###

handlers.#inf1#: ### HERE YOU SPECIFY THE HANDLERS INSTANCES YOU WISH TO USE. THE TYPE IS  ###
handlers.#inf2#: ###   THE CLASS NAME OF THE HANDLER(FOUND IN cogs/DisLogger/Handlers.py)  ###
handlers.#inf3#: ### THE FORMATTER IS A NAME OF A FORMATTER INSTANCE. CONFIG CONSISTS OF   ###
handlers.#inf4#: ###            THE ARGUMENTS NEEDED TO CREATE A HANDLER OBJECT.           ###

loggers.#inf1#: ### HERE YOU SPECIFY THE LOGGER INSTANCES YOU WISH TO USE. A LOGGER CAN   ###
loggers.#inf2#: ### INHERIT ANOTHER LOGGER. IT WORKS LIKE THIS: grandparent.parent.child  ###
loggers.#inf3#: ###  WHAT IT DOES IS IT THAT IF YOU LOG SOMETHING WITH THE CHILD LOGGER,  ###
loggers.#inf4#: ### IT WILL ALSO LOG USING ITS PARENTS. YOU ALSO SPECIFY THE INSTANCES OF ###
loggers.#inf5#: ### HANDLERS YOU WISH TO USE FOR YOUR LOGGER. THE LOG LEVELS CAN BE FOUND ###
loggers.#inf7#: ###            IF YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT IT IS, KEEP IT AT 20.               ###

monitors.#inf1#: ### HERE YOU SPECIFY THE INSTANCES OF MONITORS YOU WISH TO USE. A MONITOR ###
monitors.#inf2#: ### RUNS IN A SEPARATE THREAD AND IS WHAT CALLS THE LOGGER TO ACTUALLY LOG###
monitors.#inf3#: ### THINGS. THE TYPE IS THE NAME OF THE MONITOR CLASS, AND CONFIG CONTAINS###
monitors.#inf4#: ###         THE ARGUMENT NEEDED TO CREATE AN INSTANCE OF 'TYPE'.          ###

server.#inf1#: ###         THIS IS WHERE YOU SPECIFY YOUR DISCORD SERVERÂ INFOS.          ###

twilio.#inf1#: ###     THIS IS WHERE YOU SPECIFY YOUR TWILIO ACCOUNT API KEY VALUES.     ###
twilio.#inf2#: ### YOU CAN CREATE A FREE ACCOUNT AT: https://www.twilio.com/try-twilio.  ###
